title: Waves - MetaFilter v9.2.19.19 - OS X [packet-dada]
description:
Waves - MetaFilter v9.2.19.19 - OS X [packet-dada]
294.3 MB

Installed on Waves v9r14
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Designed around a multimode filter with extensive modulation options and powered by WavesÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ Virtual Voltage technology, Waves MetaFilter has everything you need in a sound-shaping filter plugin. The versatile MetaFilter creative effects unit provides all the warmth, depth and fatness of classic analog filters, along with the modern control and endless flexibility distinctive of Waves tools.

MetaFilter lets you individually modulate the filterÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s cutoff, resonance and delay time using three separate modulators Ã¢â‚¬â€œ a 16-step sequencer, an LFO, and an envelope follower with a sidechaining option Ã¢â‚¬â€œ making it easy to achieve effects such as filter sweeping, tremolo, auto wah, rhythmic gating, ducking, and hypnotic modulating delays with saturation buildups.

Install:

Replace all files to default directory (delete before copy/paste)
---

Delete WavesQtLibs_4.7.3 and WavesQtLibs_4.8.2

Macintosh HD /Library/Application Support/Waves/

Copy and paste WavesQtLibs_4.7.3 and WavesQtLibs_4.8.2

Macintosh HD /Library/Application Support/Waves/
---

Copy and paste AU, VST, VST3, RTAS

Macintosh HD /Library/Audio/Plug-Ins/Components/
Macintosh HD /Library/Audio/Plug-Ins/VST/
Macintosh HD /Library/Audio/Plug-Ins/VST3/
Macintosh HD /Library/Application Support/Digidesign/
---

Adds MetaFilter.bundle and WavesLib2_9.2.framework

Macintosh HD /Applications/Waves/Waves Plug-Ins/

Copy and paste /Applications/Waves/Utilities (folder)

Macintosh HD /Applications/Waves/
---

Replace

Waves AU Reg Utility 9.2
WaveShell-AU 9.2.component
WaveShell-DAE 9.2.dpm
WaveShell-VST 9.2.vst
WaveShell-VST 9.2.vst3

Macintosh HD /Applications/Waves/Waveshells/
---

Run Waves AU Reg Utility 9.2.app

Enjoy! 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
